Package com.threerings.honeybird

Interface Summary
Dimensions  
Filter Restricts the results from a query.
Metrics  
Source<V> A basic data source from the analytics API.
Sources Extends Dimensions and Metrics to expose all the builtin sources from one interface.
 

Class Summary
CurrencyMetric A double metric that returns a value in the currency configured in your Analytics account.
Dimension Represents a dimension that can be represented as a String.
DoubleMetric Represents metrics with double values.
FilterExpression Filters a specific source using a fixed operator and restriction.
Filters Contains implementations for and and or filters.
Filters.BooleanFilter  
FilterSource<T> Base class for sources that support eq and neq ie dimensions on String and metrics on double or long.
LongMetric A metric that operates on long values.
Metric<T> Base class for metrics.
PercentageMetric A metric that returns double values between 0.0 and 1.0 representing a percentage.
QueryBuilder Constructs queries using the google analytics API and conveniently exposes their results.
QueryResult Wraps a result for a single dimension combination from an analytics query.
QueryResults Wraps the results of an analytics query, exposing the aggregate and individual results conveniently to dimension and metric objects.
SecondsMetric A metric that returns a value in seconds.
VisitorTypeDimension Distinguishes between visitors in their first visit to a site, and visitors that have been there previously.
 

Enum Summary
VisitorType Result from ga:visitorType.
